description: Kiawe`s Turtonator is Kiawe`s main Pokémon and partner. It was sent out to battle Skull Gang after they tried to take Kiawe`s Charizard from him. Kiawe pointed out to Ash that is has two types: Fire and Dragon and that the spikes on Bakugames` shell explode when stimulated. It quickly took out all of Skull Gang`s Pokémon with its Dynamic Full Flame Z-Move.
name: Bakugames (Kaki)
